name: Ext_R5_FamilyMemberHistory_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.FamilyMemberHistory.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents FamilyMemberHistory.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FamilyMemberHistory|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Why was family member history performed?
element.definition: Describes why the family member history occurred in coded or textual form, or Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event.
element.comment: `FamilyMemberHistory.reason` maps to R4B `FamilyMemberHistory.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `FamilyMemberHistory.reason` maps to R4B `FamilyMemberHistory.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Why was family member history performed?
element.definition: Describes why the family member history occurred in coded or textual form, or Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event.
element.comment: `FamilyMemberHistory.reason` maps to R4B `FamilyMemberHistory.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `FamilyMemberHistory.reason` maps to R4B `FamilyMemberHistory.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes indicating why the family member history was done.
